definition: to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw
section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: The VRC PRO upgrade-refund guarantee works as follows.
sentences.chinese: 添加专业的升级退款保证工程如下。

sentences.english: Obtaining a refund from company is a complicated procedure.
sentences.chinese: 象公司索散退款手续很复杂。

sentences.english: Full-Semester Refund available within first 2 weeks of Spring Semester.
sentences.chinese: 开学兩周内，可申请一学期全额退款。

sentences.english: Once booking is confirmed, the package is non-refundable.
sentences.chinese: 套票一经确定将不能取消及退款。

sentences.english: Season- ticket holder will receive a refund if their train is cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 定期车票持有者在其车次被取消时可获得退款。

sentences.english: No refunds or transfers will be made after confirmation of registration.
sentences.chinese: 参加者在本会确认班别后不得转班或退款。

sentences.english: Have you decided whether you want me to ship via UPS or provide you with a refund.
sentences.chinese: 你觉定好了是要我用联邦快递还是给你退款。

sentences.english: This computer doesn’t work properly. I’d like to claim a refund.
sentences.chinese: 电脑坏了，我想要求退款。

sentences.english: This Pass is non-transferable and non-refundable.
sentences.chinese: 即日通用车票不得转让及退款。

sentences.english: There will be NO refund of the registration fee if the registered participants do not attend the forum.
sentences.chinese: 缴纳注册费后，若因故不能出席论坛将不获退款。

sentences.english: No refunding after it is opened.
sentences.chinese: 打开以后就不能退款了。

sentences.english: No reason to refund the customer will be several areas where an impact on it?
sentences.chinese: 无理由退款会从哪几个方面对顾客产生影响呢？

sentences.english: Check the change before you leave. No refund for tickets sold.
sentences.chinese: 购票中请当面清点票款，门票售出，恕不退款。

sentences.english: This number takes into account refunds, chargebacks, and sales tax.
sentences.chinese: 这个数字顾及到退款和销售税。

sentences.english: I demand a full refund for this purchase.
sentences.chinese: 我要求呃剐交易全铪退款。

definition: to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
to return merchandise/to withdraw a product
to replace a purchase/to exchange a purchase
to pay a sum of money/payment
to return a product for another item
to cancel (a booking)/to unsubscribe (from a newsletter etc)
to transfer (money to a bank account)
complaint/to complain/to register a complaint (esp. as a customer)
